actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the mineral leasing laws of the United States to provide for uniform treatment of certain receipts under such laws, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Leasing Act for Acquired Lands to require receipts received from leases on lands set aside for military or naval purposes to be paid into the Treasury and disposed of in the same manner as similar receipts under the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920.

titles.title: A bill to amend the mineral leasing laws of the United States to provide for uniform treatment of certain receipts under such laws, and for other purposes.
